languages.text: {n}Механические конечности Тервантьяса начинают возбужденно копошиться.{/n} "Узнаю печать изысканного кормления Хтоноса. Это честь — быть испитым моим чудесным творением и отдать свои скромные жизненные силы на преобразование его энергетическим конвертером... Не страшись, образец, мне подвластно обратить воздействие его прикосновений вспять".

{n}Tervantias' mechanical limbs start to wave with excitement.{/n} "I recognise the mark of the Chtonos's exquisite feeding. What an honour it is for you to be the vessel with which my marvellous creation satisfies its thirst and to give your modest life force so it may be transformed by an energy converter... Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."
languages.original_text: {n}Механические конечности Тервантьяса начинают возбужденно копошиться.{/n} "Узнаю печать изысканного кормления Хтоноса. Это честь — быть испитым моим чудесным творением и отдать свои скромные жизненные силы на преобразование его энергетическим конвертером... Не страшись, образец, мне подвластно обратить воздействие его прикосновений вспять".

Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."

languages.text: {n}Les membres mécaniques de Tervantias s'agitent sous le coup de l'excitation.{/n} « Je reconnais là l'exquise marque du Chtonos. Ma merveilleuse création vous a accordé un véritable honneur en se servant de vous pour satisfaire sa soif. Votre modeste force vitale a été ainsi convertie en énergie plus utile... Ne vous inquiétez pas, spécimen. Je suis en mesure de faire disparaître les conséquences de son contact. »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias' mechanical limbs start to wave with excitement.{/n} "I recognise the mark of the Chtonos's exquisite feeding. What an honour it is for you to be the vessel with which my marvellous creation satisfies its thirst and to give your modest life force so it may be transformed by an energy converter... Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les membres mécaniques de Tervantias s'agitent sous le coup de l'excitation.{/n} « Je reconnais là l'exquise marque du Chtonos. Ma merveilleuse création vous a accordé un véritable honneur en se servant de vous pour satisfaire sa soif. Votre modeste force vitale a été ainsi convertie en énergie plus utile... Ne vous inquiétez pas, spécimen. Je suis en mesure de faire disparaître les conséquences de son contact. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯的机械肢体兴奋地挥舞起来。{/n}“我看出来了，这是奇托诺斯精致的噬咬留下的痕迹。那件美妙的造物正出自我的手中，你能成为它的猎物，满足它的渴望，献出你微薄的生命力，进入它的能量转换器之中，这是何等的荣耀啊……不要害怕，实验对象，我知道如何消除它的影响。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias' mechanical limbs start to wave with excitement.{/n} "I recognise the mark of the Chtonos's exquisite feeding. What an honour it is for you to be the vessel with which my marvellous creation satisfies its thirst and to give your modest life force so it may be transformed by an energy converter... Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯的机械肢体兴奋地挥舞起来。{/n}“我看出来了，这是奇托诺斯精致的噬咬留下的痕迹。那件美妙的造物正出自我的手中，你能成为它的猎物，满足它的渴望，献出你微薄的生命力，进入它的能量转换器之中，这是何等的荣耀啊……不要害怕，实验对象，我知道如何消除它的影响。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias' mechanische Gliedmaßen beginnen, aufgeregt zu winken.{/n} "Ich erkenne die Spuren von Chtonos' exquisiter Speisung. Welch eine Ehre für Euch, das meine wunderbare Schöpfung an Euch ihren Durst stillt. Dass Ihr Eure bescheidene Lebenskraft gibt, damit sie von einem Energiewandler umgewandelt werden kann ... Seid unbesorgt, Versuchsstück, es liegt in meiner Macht, die Auswirkungen seiner Berührung umzukehren."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias' mechanical limbs start to wave with excitement.{/n} "I recognise the mark of the Chtonos's exquisite feeding. What an honour it is for you to be the vessel with which my marvellous creation satisfies its thirst and to give your modest life force so it may be transformed by an energy converter... Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias' mechanische Gliedmaßen beginnen, aufgeregt zu winken.{/n} "Ich erkenne die Spuren von Chtonos' exquisiter Speisung. Welch eine Ehre für Euch, das meine wunderbare Schöpfung an Euch ihren Durst stillt. Dass Ihr Eure bescheidene Lebenskraft gibt, damit sie von einem Energiewandler umgewandelt werden kann ... Seid unbesorgt, Versuchsstück, es liegt in meiner Macht, die Auswirkungen seiner Berührung umzukehren."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias agita sus extremidades mecánicas emocionado.{/n} «Reconozco la marca de un alimento exquisito para Chtonos. Qué honor debe de ser para ti ser el recipiente con el que mi maravillosa creación sacia su sed, y otorgar tu modesta fuerza vital para luego transformarla con un convertidor de energía... No temas, espécimen, tengo el poder de revertir los efectos que produce».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias' mechanical limbs start to wave with excitement.{/n} "I recognise the mark of the Chtonos's exquisite feeding. What an honour it is for you to be the vessel with which my marvellous creation satisfies its thirst and to give your modest life force so it may be transformed by an energy converter... Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias agita sus extremidades mecánicas emocionado.{/n} «Reconozco la marca de un alimento exquisito para Chtonos. No temas, espécimen, tengo el poder de revertir los efectos que produce».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの機械の手足が興奮で震え始める。{/n}「私はチャトノスの痕跡を見極めることができる。お前は器となって私の素晴らしい創造物の渇きを満たし、そのささやかな生命力をエネルギー変換装置によって変換されるよう捧げることができるのだ。なんと光栄なことか…恐れることはない、標本よ。私ならその影響を反転させることができる」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias' mechanical limbs start to wave with excitement.{/n} "I recognise the mark of the Chtonos's exquisite feeding. What an honour it is for you to be the vessel with which my marvellous creation satisfies its thirst and to give your modest life force so it may be transformed by an energy converter... Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの機械の手足が興奮で震え始める。{/n}「私はチャトノスの痕跡を見極めることができる。お前は器となって私の素晴らしい創造物の渇きを満たし、そのささやかな生命力をエネルギー変換装置によって変換されるよう捧げることができるのだ。なんと光栄なことか…恐れることはない、標本よ。私ならその影響を反転させることができる」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias'ın mekanik uzuvları, heyecanla salınmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ktonos'un harikulade beslenme biçimi bu, hemen tanıdım. Muazzam yaratımım susuzluğunu giderme aracı olarak seni seçtiği ve sıradan yaşamına bir enerji dönüştürücü ile biçim değiştirme gücü verdiği için onur duymalısın. Korkma numune, dokunuşunun etkilerini tersine çevirme gücüne sahibim."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias' mechanical limbs start to wave with excitement.{/n} "I recognise the mark of the Chtonos's exquisite feeding. What an honour it is for you to be the vessel with which my marvellous creation satisfies its thirst and to give your modest life force so it may be transformed by an energy converter... Fear not, specimen, it is within my power to reverse the effects of its touch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias'ın mekanik uzuvları heyecanla salınmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ktonos'un harikulade beslenme biçiminin izlerini tanıyorum. Muazzam yaratımım susuzluğunu giderme aracı olarak seni seçtiği ve sıradan yaşamına bir enerji dönüştürücü ile biçim değiştirme gücü verdiği için onur duymalısın. Korkma numune, dokunuşunun etkilerini tersine çevirme gücüne sahibim."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
